description: Die when an emulation error occurs, even in "batch mode"
When the script prints data, do not print it to the console
Do not rewrite `eval` so that its argument is rewritten
Do not rewrite the source code at all, other than for `@cc_on` support
Do not throw a fake error when executing `WScriptShell.Run` (it throws a fake error by default to pretend that the distribution sites are down, so that the script will attempt to poll every site)
Do not rewrite `typeof` (e.g. `typeof ActiveXObject`, which must return 'unknown' in the JScript standard and not 'object')
The location on disk to write the results files and folders to (defaults to the current directory)
The script will timeout after this many seconds (default 10)
Emulate Windows XP (influences the value of environment variables)
